skillTree.localised_description: The Jade Ronin under the Daiymo are even stranger and more exotic that previously seen.

effects.description:
Unit Passive: "Risen Thunder" for Jade Ronin and Jade Ronin Kinlin Riders
	(all units in army)

ui_effects.localised_text: Enemies hit by lightning strikes in melee combat
Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: If anything, this one has an even greater lust for life than they did before their death.

related_attributes.bullet_text: Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.

skillTree.localised_description: It's An Endless Abyss
The souls of forgotten Cathayan warriors, enslaved by the Daimyo for eternity.

ui_effects.localised_text: Summons a unit of Ancestral Warriors

skillTree.localised_description: They say that the lightning persisted for days after the battle. All that remained was dust and the smell of Ozone.

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: The thunder rippled in the distance as the sky itself seemed to open...

ui_effects.localised_text: Explosion does not affect friendly troops

skillTree.localised_description: Wielding a blade of cursed jade, all who are unfortunate enough to be struck by the Daimyos sword suffer an agonizingly painful end.

effects.description: Attacks cause "Slow Death" effect, draining hit points

skillTree.localised_description: Swirling arcing energy poured fourth from the tear in the sky, incinerating all who were foolish enough to watch.
It is no easy task to bend or break the armour of this being.
There is nothing but utter belief. There is no reasoning with this one.
"Don't look into their eyes, there is only death there!"
Such is this one's conviction that others have no choice but to believe.
Speaking words of power or faith can alter perceptions on the battlefield.
This one will not go down easily – it will be necessary to break both the will and the body first.
An omen, a sign - this being knows things and any who follow will share their glory.
Never to be broken or dishonoured – never to succumb to the foe.
This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.
A hybrid of familar and new magics, the disiples of abhorash have new and powerful tools to stay in the fight.

target_if: Hit point replenishment cap not reached

skillTree.localised_description: Many mortal champions change their attitude when their proud challenge is accepted by a dark creature whose very eyes are the eyes of death…

skillTree.localised_description: By stabbing a staff or some arcane conduit into the ground, an accomplished magic-user can earth or tether the Winds and hopefully reduce a chance of miscasting.
A few magic-users have the ability to store the Winds of Magic for later use, increasing their spellcasting power when it really counts.

effects.description: Winds of Magic power reserve capacity: +5

skillTree.localised_description: Those in the army can find succour or be replenished by the power of this champion.

effects.description: Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 3%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 6%
Replenish Troops action: Replenishment rate is increased by an additional 9%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 1
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 2
Spread Corruption action: Vampiric corruption is increased by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: It is not just the forces of Chaos that can despoil, break and ruin.

effects.description: Damage Building action: Additional 5% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 15% damage caused
Damage Building action: Additional 30% damage caused

skillTree.localised_description: Such a champion will not bend or break, but slay in their Lord's name.

effects.description: Wound action: Additional 5% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 12% chance of wounding target
Wound action: Additional 21% chance of wounding target

skillTree.localised_description: The sight of a powerful figure extolling death and blasphemies can bring enemy ranks to their knees.

effects.description: Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -10%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -20%
Hinder Replenishment action: Replenishment is modified by an additional -40%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text:
Undead units cannot be routed, but take damage when their Leadership is broken.
	
	Undead units also have:
	 Fear and Terror Immunity
	
	Undead units may also have their hit points restored by special characters such as the Vampire Counts Necromancer.
This unit can cause terror, making its melee target rout for a short time. Units that cause terror are immune to terror and fear themselves.
This unit frightens all enemy units, reducing their leadership when nearby. It is also immune to fear. Fear penalties do not stack.
Even when performing the most fatiguing actions, this unit never loses vigour.
When two or more units in the same army share this attribute,  intensity increases the power of spells cast.
This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.

target_if: Unit is not Lord or Hero

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A warlord of a mysterious conclave know as the Jade Shogunate, little if anything at all is know about the Jade Daimyo or his Jade Ronin.

effects.description: When normally killed in action, this Hero will be wounded instead

ui_effects.localised_text: Form offers powerful melee attacks and flight
Restricted spell availability and reduction in Harmony multiplier
